name: 千雪
text: きゃっ……！
trans: Kya...!

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃんっ、いっぱい来てるよ！
trans: Tenka, there's too many!

name: 甜花
trans: Nhn...

name: 甜花
text: ──任せて
trans: I'll handle this.

name: 甜花
text: ふーっ…………余裕
trans: Phew... piece of cake.

name: 甘奈
text:
ひゃーっ☆
甜花ちゃん、さすが～！　かっこ良かったよー☆
trans:
Wow!
Tenka was cool as always!

name: 千雪
text:
本当……！
すごいのね、甜花ちゃん……！
trans:
Indeed!
That was amazing, Tenka!

name: 千雪
text:
私、今なんにもできなかったわね
ごめんなさい
trans: Sorry I wasn't much use back there.

name: 甜花
text:
ううん、千雪さん……甜花こそ……
……甜花の教え方、悪かった……？
trans: No... it was Tenka's lackluster instruction... that is to blame...

name: 千雪
text:
違うの甜花ちゃん！
ルールはちゃんとわかってたはずだったんだけど
trans:
Not at all, Tenka!
I understood the rules, I think...

name: 千雪
text: 実際に敵が出てくると、びっくりしちゃって
trans: But when the enemies started coming out, I panicked and couldn't do anything.

name: 甜花
text: そっか……それは、慣れが必要……
trans: I see... then it's just a matter of getting used to it...

name: 甜花
text:
……後は……
反射で、体が動くようにする……
trans: Also, when returning fire, move your whole body to aim...

name: 甘奈
text: おおっ、プロみたいだよ！　甜花ちゃん！
trans: Oooh! Tenka, you sound like a seasoned vet!

name: 甘奈
text:
でも反射は難しいよね。千雪さん初めてだし……
もう１回説明があった方がいいんじゃないかな？
trans: But handling a gun isn't so easy for a novice like Chiyuki... Perhaps you should explain things to her one more time?

name: 千雪
text:
そうね
私、まだ手順を思い浮かべないと動けないもの
trans: I'd appreciate that. My movements haven't become second nature yet.

name: 甜花
text:
わかった……
そしたら、おさらいしよう……
trans:
Okay...
Then let's have a practice run...

name: 甜花
text:
撃つのは、簡単……
忘れちゃダメなのは、リロード……
trans: Shooting is relatively simple... It's the reloading part that everyone forgets about...

name: 甜花
text:
あと、狙いが……安定しなくなっちゃうから……
銃、持ったら……脇……しめるって、意識する……
trans: Also, your arms are naturally unstable when aiming... so it helps to keep your elbows in...

name: 千雪
text: うん。リロードと、銃の持ち方ね──……！
trans: Right. So the two points are reloading and keeping your elbows in.

name: 甜花
text:
……最後に……びっくりしても……
銃を下げない……
trans: And finally, no matter what happens, don't lower your weapon.

name: 千雪
text:
びっくりしても銃を下げない……
これが１番難しそう……
trans:
No matter what happens, don't lower your weapon...
That might be the most difficult...

name: 甜花
text: ……いけそう……？
trans: Think you can handle it?

name: 千雪
text: ──大丈夫！　いけるわ、甜花ちゃん
trans: I'll be fine! Let's do this, Tenka!

name: 甜花
text: ……じゃあ、次のステージ……！
trans: Then onwards to the next stage!

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃんも千雪さんも頑張れー☆
甘奈、動画撮っとくからね！
trans: Tenka, Chiyuki, Do your best! I'll be recording you, okay?

name: 甜花
text: この程度……甜花の、敵じゃない……！
trans: Hmph. You are not worthy to call yourself my enemy!

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃんいいよ～！
そっちの敵、すぐいなくなっちゃいそう！
trans:
You're doing great, Tenka!
They're dropping like flies!

name: 千雪
text:
わぁっ……！
や、やっぱり、始まると驚いちゃうわね……！
trans: Wah...! As expected, this is rather intense for a novice like me!

name: 甘奈
text: 千雪さん！　右右！
trans: Chiyuki, on the right! The right!

name: 千雪
text: えっ？　あっ、こっちにもいたのね──？！
trans: Oh, they're over there, too?!

name: 甜花
text:
まだ、距離ある……
落ち着いて……！
trans:
You still have some distance on them.
Don't panic!

name: 千雪
text: ありがとう甜花ちゃん、えっと、よく狙って──
trans: Thanks, Tenka. So... aim and...

name: 千雪
text: ──えいっ
trans: Fire!

name: 甜花
text: ……お見事……
trans: ...A commendable shot...

name: 甘奈
text:
わーっ、すごいよ千雪さん！
１発で急所に直撃だったね！
trans:
Woah! That was great, Chiyuki!
A one shot critical-hit!

name: 千雪
text: ほんとう？　良かったぁ……！
trans: Really? Thank goodness...!

name: 甜花
text: 千雪さん……リロード、忘れない……
trans: Chiyuki... Don't forget to reload...

name: 千雪
text: あっ、ごめんなさい！
trans: Ah, sorry!

name: 千雪
text: ……ふふっ
trans: ...Fufu.

name: 甘奈
text:
あっ、千雪さん！？
前来てるよっ、撃って撃って～！
trans:
Chiyuki! They're appearing in front of you!
Shoot! Shoot!

name: 千雪
text: ええっ！？
trans: Ehhh!?

name: 甜花
text: いっぱい、遊んじゃった……
trans: We played a whole lot...

name: 甘奈
text: ホントだね！　甜花ちゃんが楽しそうで良かった☆
trans: We really did! I'm glad you had fun, Tenka!

name: 甜花
text: みんなで遊ぶの、楽しい……
trans: Coming here with everyone was fun...

name: 甘奈
text: 結構色んなゲームがあったもんね～☆
trans: There were quite a few different games, weren't there?

name: 千雪
text: 甜花ちゃん、どれも上手ですごかったわ
trans: But Tenka was good at all of them. I'm impressed.

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……そうかな……
trans: Nihehe... was I really...?

name: 千雪
text: ええ、それに教えるのも上手！
trans: Yes, and your coaching was great too!

name: 千雪
text:
私、次ここに来たら、
ひとりでも全部のゲームができちゃいそうだもの
trans: Even if I came on my own next time, I'd know how to play them all!

name: 甜花
text:
それは……
千雪さん……コツ覚えるの、早かったから……
trans: That's because you're quick at learning the game mechanics, Chiyuki.

name: 千雪
text:
えー？
ガンシューティングの時の私を見ても、まだそう言える？
trans: Really? Can you still say that after witnessing my abysmal marksmanship?

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……
trans: Nihehe...

name: 甘奈
text:
あ、ふたりともごめん！
甘奈、中に忘れ物してきちゃった！
trans:
Ah, sorry, you two!
I left something inside!

name: 甘奈
text: ちょっと待ってて！
trans: I'll be back!

name: 千雪
text:
あ、甘奈ちゃん、一緒に戻っても──って、
もう行っちゃった……
trans:
Amana, we can come with you...
Oh, she disappeared.

name: 千雪
text: ──甜花ちゃん、ゲーム詳しいのね
trans: Tenka, you know a lot about games don't you?

name: 甜花
trans: Ah...

name: 甜花
text:
どう……だろ……
いっぱい、やってる……だけ……
trans: Well... I just... play a lot of them...

name: 千雪
text: そう？
trans: I see.

name: 千雪
text:
でも私、今日は甜花ちゃんのエスコートがあったから、
ゲームを何倍も楽しめたんだと思うな
trans: Well, being escorted by you today has helped me enjoy gaming so much more.

name: 千雪
text: 今度は、また違うゲームも教えてもらっていい？
trans: Can we do this again? I'd love for you to teach me some new games.

name: 甜花
text:
うん……っ
いつでも……！
trans: Yeah... anytime!

name: 甜花
text:
…………
あ、あの……この前……
trans: ...Um, you know... before...

name: 千雪
text: なあに？
trans: Yes?

name: 甜花
text:
ブックカフェ……で、
……なーちゃんと、何話してたの？
trans: When we were at the book cafe... what were you and Na-chan talking about?

name: 千雪
text: 本のお話よ
trans: About books, of course!

name: 千雪
text:
どういう本を読むのか聞いたり──
甘奈ちゃんに、おすすめしてもらったりとか
trans: We talked about what kind of books we liked, and Amana gave me some recommendations.

name: 甜花
text: そ、そうなんだ……
trans: I-I see...

name: 甜花
text:
……甜花も、おすすめ……
してもらうこと……あるよ
trans: ...Na-chan's also recommended books to me, but...

name: 甜花
text:
でも……なーちゃんと、
本のこと、じっくり話すのは……なくて……
trans: We've never talked about books that deeply.

name: 甜花
text: ……甜花も、なーちゃんに、聞いてみる……！
trans: Tenka will ask Na-chan about books sometime too!

name: 千雪
text: ……ええ
trans: Definitely.

name: 甘奈
text:
お待たせ～……！
ふたりとも、ごめんなさい
trans: Tenka, Chiyuki, sorry to keep you waiting!

name: 千雪
text:
ううん、いいのよ
すぐ見つかって良かった
trans: It's okay. I'm glad you found your things quickly.

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、シューティングゲームのとこに
置きっぱなしにしちゃってたみたいで──
trans: Yeah, I had left them near the shooting game and forgot to pick them up.

name: 甘奈
text:
その時にね、あのゲームやってる人がいたんだけど、
やっぱり楽しそうで、もっと遊びたくなっちゃった
trans: When I went back, though, there was someone else playing and it looked so fun, I was tempted to play another round!

name: 甘奈
text: ……ね、取材の場所、どこにしよっか？
trans: As for the newspaper report, though... which should we go for?

name: 甘奈
text: ブックカフェもゲームセンターも、どっちも良かったし……
trans: Both the book cafe and game center would be good choices...

name: 甜花
text: どっちかに……決めるの……む、難しい……
trans: It's hard to decide...

name: 千雪
text: ……そうね……
trans: ...It is...

name: 千雪
text: ……あっ、そうだ！
trans: Oh, I know!

name: 甘奈＆甜花
trans: Hmm?

name: 千雪
text:
……ねえ、私たちみんな、『１枠』っていうのは
１か所のことだって決めつけてたけど……
trans: I know they've given us one column to write about a single place...

name: 千雪
text: まだ相談する余地はあるんじゃないかしら
trans: But perhaps they'd be open to suggestions.

name: 千雪
text:
『話題のニュースポット、ブックカフェVS.
地元で愛されるレトロなゲームセンター』
trans: "An epic showdown starring new challenger Book Cafe vs local favorite Retro Game Center!"

name: 千雪
text:
……って感じでテーマにしちゃえば……
どっちも記事にできるかもしれないなって！
trans: With that kind of theme, we'd be able to do both!

name: 甘奈
text:
わぁ……！
千雪さんっ、それ名案☆
trans: Wow...! Chiyuki, you're a genius!

name: 甜花
text:
千雪さん……すごい……
甜花、それがいい……！
trans: Chiyuki... What a great plan! Tenka agrees!

name: 千雪
text: ふふっ、じゃあ、プロデューサーさんに相談してみようね
trans: Fufu. In that case, let's ask Producer.

name: 甘奈＆甜花
text: うん……！
trans: Yes!

name: 千雪
text: それに……縁日の方ももうすぐだから、準備しなきゃ♪
trans: Not to mention, the festival day is fast approaching. Gotta make preparations♪
